i am not very good at playing basketball.
I wish my dog could come with me on all my travels.

i love the walking dead.

participant_2.background:
I built a detailed model of the Eiffel Tower last year.
twilight is my favorite book series.
I enjoy a good cup of coffee in the morning to start my day off right.
I work as a park ranger, which allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.
I'd love to learn more about my family history and where I come from.

content.text: Morning! What are your plans for the day?
Not much, just catching up on some shows on my tablet. What about you?
I'm going to work as a park ranger, it allows me to spend my days surrounded by nature.
That sounds like a great job! I would love to work outside more.
It's really fun, I get to meet a lot of interesting people. What do you do for fun?
I like to listen to music and watch my favorite TV shows. I also love to travel, I've been to a lot of different countries.
I'd love to travel more, I've only been to a few different countries. I've been wanting to go to Japan for a while.
Japan is a beautiful country, I would love to go back again someday.
Do you have any other hobbies?
Yes, I love to cook and I have a dog.
I love dogs! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Bailey.
Oh my gosh, golden retrievers are the best! I love their fluffy tails.
Yes, they are so cute and cuddly
